Sutherland is looking good today with 3 ft @ 11s NNW swell and light 10 mph SSE winds. Melvich and Strathy are your top picks, especially during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, expect a solid increase to 5 ft @ 12s W with fresh 17 mph SE winds, making for a fun day at spots like Melvich and Sango Bay. On the day after, conditions ease slightly to 4 ft @ 10s NW with light 8 mph SE winds, still offering plenty of fun. Best: tomorrow.
